specifications.Finish: Chemical > Milled Milling(felting) is the process of beating wet, woven woolen cloth to cause the opposing fibers to interlock and form a more homogeneous textile. It results in a denser fabric with slight water and wind resistance.
specifications.Characteristics: Yarn Effect > Woolen Yarn Woolen is a type of yarn made from carded wool, usually created from the shorter fibers of the sheep's fleece. Woolen yarn is soft, lightweight, stretchy, and airy. It is commonly used to make thick, heavyweight woven or knitted garments.
specifications.Dye Method: Dope Dye "Dope dye is a method where color is added before the yarn is formed, embedding pigments throughout the fiber. This creates deep, uniform color that resists fading over time. Fabrics made with dope-dyed yarns often show a chambray-like texture and a premium look."
specifications.Care Instructions: Dry clean only Recommended Use Suits, Coats
